item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，富国银行终止高层招聘多元化政策
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引一份给员工的备忘录报道称，富国银行（Wells Fargo）已经终止了在美国高级职位第一轮面试中要求候选人多元化的政策。【原文：Wells Fargo has ended its policy that required a diverse slate of candidates in the first round of interviews for senior-level roles in the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday citing a memo to staff.】

item.title: 美国监管机构将通过新的劳工工作组调查德意公司
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（U.S. Federal Trade Commission）周三表示，作为新成立的劳动力市场特别工作组的一部分，该机构将调查企业在多元化、公平和包容性目标方面可能存在的串通行为。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission will look into potential corporate collusion on diversity, equity and inclusion targets as part of a new labor market task force, the agency said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会与 Tron 创始人孙正义探讨民事欺诈案的解决方案
item.description: 根据周三提交的一份法庭文件，孙正义和美国证券交易委员会正在探讨如何解决监管机构针对这位中国加密货币企业家的民事欺诈案。【原文：Justin Sun and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission are exploring a resolution to the regulator's civil fraud case against the Chinese cryptocurrency entrepreneur, according to a Wednesday court filing.】

item.title: 龙舌兰酒制造商贝克公司第四季度利润骤降 21
item.description: 世界最大的龙舌兰酒生产商墨西哥贝克公司（Becle）周三公布，第四季度利润为 15.5 亿比索，同比下降 21%，收入为 129 亿比索。【原文：Mexico's Becle , the world's largest tequila producer, on Wednesday reported a fourth quarter profit down 21% from a year earlier, hitting 1.55 billion pesos, while revenues landed at 12.9 billion pesos.】

item.title: 芯片设计软件需求增长，Synopsys 季度收入预期超预期
item.description: 受芯片设计软件需求增长的推动，Synopsys 公司周三预计第二季度收入将超过华尔街预期。【原文：Synopsys forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, boosted by growing demand for its software used in designing chips.】

item.title: 继 2024 年利润增长 12% 之后，华润集团预计利润将进一步增长
item.description: 美国和欧洲最大的建材生产商华润集团周三公布了2024年12%的增长率，符合其指导目标，并预测2025年核心利润将增长6%至12%。【原文：CRH forecast core profit growth of 6% to 12% in 2025 after the largest building materials producer in the United States and Europe posted 12% growth for 2024 on Wednesday, in line with its guidance.】

item.title: 比特币下跌 5%，报 84 201 美元
item.description: 全球市值最大的加密货币比特币在北京时间周三21:56下跌5%，至84201美元。【原文：Bitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency by market value, dropped 5% to $84,201 at 21:56 GMT on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲："关税狂人 "发威，英伟达发布报告，收益率和股市下挫
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 成本抵消假日购物热潮，澳大利亚 Coles 利润下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚食品杂货商 Coles Group Ltd 周四报告称，其上半年利润下降了 3%，原因是其超市业务在假日购物的支持下实现了强劲的销售增长，但与租赁相关的融资成本上升抵消了这一增长。【原文：Australian grocer Coles Group Ltd reported a 3% drop in its first-half profit on Thursday as strong sales growth at its Supermarket business, on the back of holiday shopping, was offset by a rise in financing costs related to its leases.】

item.title: 高盛集团新增总裁约翰-沃尔德伦为董事会成员
item.description: 这家华尔街银行在周三提交的一份监管文件中表示，高盛将其总裁兼首席运营官约翰-沃尔德隆（John Waldron）纳入董事会。【原文：Goldman Sachs added its president and chief operating officer John Waldron to the board, the Wall Street bank said in a regulatory filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 花旗集团任命 Chris Biotti 领导北美私人银行业务
item.description: 花旗集团周三任命 Chris Biotti 为北美私人银行主管。【原文：Citigroup appointed Chris Biotti as the head of its private bank for North America on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳航宣布五年多来首次派息，利润上升
item.description: 澳大利亚国旗航空公司澳航（Qantas Airways）周四宣布五年多来首次派发股息，并公布上半年基本利润增长 11.2%。【原文：Australia's flag carrier Qantas Airways declared its first dividend in more than five years and reported an 11.2% increase in its first-half underlying profit on Thursday.】

item.title: 民主党参议员敦促特朗普提名的商务部长对华采取强硬立场
item.description: 一位资深民主党参议员周三以中国初创公司 DeepSeek 的人工智能技术为由，敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统提名的商务部工业与安全局局长人选对中国采取强硬立场。【原文：A senior Democratic senator on Wednesday urged President Donald Trump's nominee to lead the Commerce Department's Bureau of Industry and Security to take a tough line on China, citing Chinese startup DeepSeek's artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 英伟达预测第一季度营收高于预期
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周三预测第一季度营收将高于市场预期，预计随着企业斥巨资扩建生成式人工智能基础设施，对其领先的人工智能芯片的强劲需求将持续存在。【原文：Nvidia forecast first-quarter revenue above market estimates on Wednesday, expecting robust demand for its leading AI chips to persist as businesses spend heavily to expand generative artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 雪花公司预测年度产品收入高于预期
item.description: 雪花公司（Snowflake）周三预测，2026 年全年产品收入将高于分析师预期，因为这家数据分析提供商认为，随着人工智能的发展，云服务的增长将不断上升。【原文：Snowflake forecast annual 2026 product revenue above analysts' estimates on Wednesday, as the data analytics provider sees rising cloud service growth amid advancements in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 预测年度收入低于预期
item.description: 本周三，Beyond Meat 预计全年营收将低于预期，因为仿肉制品生产商在通胀高企的情况下面临着持续的需求疲软。【原文：Beyond Meat forecast annual revenue below estimates on Wednesday, as faux meat products maker faces persistent demand weakness amid sticky inflation.】

item.title: 需求疲软，EBay 预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: 电子商务公司 eBay 周三预测第一季度营收低于华尔街预期，表明市场对收藏品和翻新商品等产品的需求疲软，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 7%。【原文：E-commerce firm eBay forecast first-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling weak demand for products such as collector's items and refurbished goods, sending its shares down 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: Salesforce年度业绩低于预期，原因是Agentforce应用滞后
item.description: 商业软件供应商 Salesforce 周三预测 2026 财年营收将低于华尔街预期，受人工智能代理平台采用速度放缓的影响，该公司股价在延时交易中下跌约 5%。【原文：Business software provider Salesforce forecast fiscal 2026 revenue below Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, weighed down by slower adoption of its artificial intelligence agent platform, sending shares of the company down around 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司季度收入低于预期，原因是有线电视业务持续下滑
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周三公布的第四季度营收低于华尔街预期，原因是其有线电视部门的持续下滑影响了派拉蒙+流媒体平台高于预期的用户增长。【原文：Paramount Global fell short of Wall Street's fourth-quarter revenue expectations on Wednesday as a continued decline in its cable TV unit clouded higher-than-expected subscriber growth for its Paramount+ streaming platform.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财政部长批准卡塔尔航空公司收购维珍澳大利亚航空公司 25% 的股份
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）周四早些时候报道，澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）批准了卡塔尔航空公司购买维珍澳大利亚航空公司 25% 股份的提议。【原文：Australia's Treasurer Jim Chalmers approved Qatar Airways' proposal to buy a 25% stake in Virgin Australia , the Australian Financial Review reported early on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称贝恩资本酝酿以 100 亿美元出售 Rocket Software
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）正在权衡各种方案，包括出售 Rocket Software，该公司的估值可能高达 100 亿美元（包括债务）。【原文：Private equity firm Bain Capital is weighing options, including a sale, for Rocket Software that could value the U.S. automation software provider at as much as $10 billion, including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 纽约联储研究报告指出对中国进口商品征收关税将引发新的通胀因素
item.description: 纽约联邦储备委员会的一份研究报告周三称，如果特朗普政府全面跟进对中国进口商品征收关税，美国经济可能会面临新一轮通胀冲击。【原文：The U.S. economy could be in for a fresh inflation jolt if the Trump administration fully follows through withtariffs on Chinese imports, a New York Federal Reserve research paper said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：Alphabet 旗下谷歌裁减部分云计算部门员工
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司裁减了云计算部门的员工。【原文：Alphabet's Google cut employees in its cloud division, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷油籽工会威胁在主要大豆加工厂举行罢工
item.description: 阿根廷主要油籽工会 SOEA 的一位领导人周三表示，由于出口企业集团 Vicentin 的工资纠纷，该工会威胁要在大豆加工厂举行全国性罢工。【原文：Argentina's main oilseed union SOEA has threatened a national strike in soybean processing plants over a salary dispute at exports conglomerate Vicentin, a union leader said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 加密货币公司创始人从葡萄牙被引渡至美国，面临欺诈指控
item.description: 一家加密货币金融服务公司的创始人已被从葡萄牙引渡到美国，他被指控参与了一个大范围的计划，代表客户公司操纵数字代币市场。【原文：The founder of a cryptocurrency financial services firm has been extradited from Portugal to face U.S. charges that he participated in a wide-ranging scheme to manipulate the market for digital tokens on behalf of client companies.】

item.title: 花旗银行预测第四季度铜关税将达到 25
item.description: 花旗银行周三在一份报告中称，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发布行政命令启动对美国进口铜的调查后，花旗预计到2025年第四季度将最终实施25%的铜关税。【原文：Citi anticipates an eventual implementation of a 25% copper-specific tariff by the fourth quarter of 2025, following U.S. President Donald Trump's executive order initiating an investigation into U.S. copper imports, the bank said in a note on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印度法院命令亚马逊在比佛利山马球俱乐部案中支付 3,900 万美元赔偿金
item.description: 印度一家法院周三发布的一项命令显示，亚马逊的一个部门因侵犯 "比佛利山马球俱乐部 "商标而被勒令支付 3900 万美元的赔偿金，因为亚马逊的印度网站上销售了带有相同品牌的服装。【原文：An Indian court has ordered an Amazon unit to pay $39 million in damages for infringing the "Beverly Hills Polo Club" trademark after garments with identical branding were sold on Amazon's India website, a court order showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，美国证券交易委员会通知工会员工四月中旬返回办公室
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，美国证券交易委员会已告知工会成员员工，除非他们有某些豁免，否则他们必须在四月中旬返回办公室。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has told employees who are union members they will have to return to the office in mid-April, unless they have certain exemptions, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 农用设备制造商迪尔的投资者拒绝接受反经济增长决议
item.description: 迪尔投资者周三以压倒性多数票反对一项针对其多元化、公平和包容努力的决议，延续了股东厌恶反多元化、公平和包容措施的模式，尽管共和党对高管们施加了政治压力。【原文：Deere investors voted overwhelmingly against a resolution aimed at its diversity, equity and inclusion efforts on Wednesday, continuing a pattern of shareholder distaste for anti-DEI measures despite Republican political pressure on executives.】

item.title: 特朗普在对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税问题上制造混乱，提出对欧盟商品征收 25% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，对墨西哥和加拿大进口商品征收的新关税可能于4月2日生效，并提出对欧洲汽车和其他商品征收25%的 "对等 "关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday raised hopes for another month-long pause on steep new tariffs on imports from Mexico and Canada, saying they could take effect on April 2, and floated a 25% "reciprocal" tariff on European cars and other goods.】
